name: 2 Get accounts from lists
description:
Add List ID as seed node. 

You get the list ID from a list or a saved search/post at your CrowdTangle Dashboard (Preset 1) or you do a search with the search endpoint.

With this preset you can get the accounts for a given list. The list has to be of type list, saved searches and saved posts do not have associated accounts.

This preset fetches 10 accounts of a list. You can increase the count-parameter up to 100 to get more accounts.

DON'T FORGET: Before you can fetch the data, you must enter your CrowdTangle access token in the corresponding field "access token" for authentication.

See https://github.com/CrowdTangle/API/wiki/List-Accounts for more information. 

API-Cheatsheet: https://help.crowdtangle.com/en/articles/3443476-api-cheat-sheet
